pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Numpy deep-frameworkNumPy based deep learning framework. Implemented for production purposes whereit is critical to use Tensorflwo, PyTorch or any other no-Numpy framework.### Installation cd <to-package-dir> pip install . # when it will be deployed to pip # pip install ndf### UsageThe syntax is similar to Keras's.Check the example [squeezenet model](https://github.com/PrimozGodec/ndf/blob/master/ndf/example_models/squeezenet.py).
